name: All Hallows: Rise of the Pumpkin
overview: Its All Hallows eve... Deep in the vast forest kingdom there is a dark, dank tower. Within its walls was sealed the evil Dark Forest Lord. Ancient Sages used the powerful magic of the Moonstones to capture this great evil. After a thousand years however the magic of the Moonstones is fading. They need to be re-energised by another magical creature. As a forest spirit you feel that magic fading. Pumpkin! you have been chosen to stop this fiend before he escapes his prison! Brave the creatures already drawn to this evil place and find the Moonstones, one touch of your magical spirit will bring them back to life!
